description: Germany and Italy want slopes closed until January, but the EU is yet to reach an agreement.
title: Coronavirus pandemic: Germany seeks EU deal to close ski resorts
title_page: Coronavirus pandemic: Germany seeks EU deal to close ski resorts - BBC News
maintext: Ski lifts are running, with a requirement to wear masks, prompting criticism from WHO Covid-19 envoy David Nabarro. "Once infection rates sink, and they will sink, then we can be as free as we want. But right now? Should ski resorts open? Under what conditions?"
